title: [Shirley Bassey Show]
brief_description: An extract from ‘The Shirley Bassey Show’. Shirley introduces a woman who sings ‘ Happiness is…’, followed by a fashion segment using Sydney as backdrop for models showcasing the latest Mary Quant range. Finishes with a Dulux paint advertisment. No titles or credits.
